regimentAbilities.name: Infested with Wonders
regimentAbilities.lore: These foul warriors invite the most horrific and repulsive diseases into their flesh, and they cannot wait to share them.
regimentAbilities.effect: Each time a friendly model is slain, before it is removed from play, you can pick an enemy unit within 1" of it and roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Locus of Fecundity
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase, Your Hero Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: Nurgle bestows a blessing of bountiful regrowth upon his children.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Summoner of Plaguebearers
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Channelling a link to the Realm of Chaos, the Spoilpox Scrivener brings forth more minions.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly **Plaguebearers** unit wholly within 14" of your general.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Return 1 slain model to that unit.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Gift of Febrile Frenzy
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: A reeking miasma rises around the daemon Herald that drives nearby followers into a wild delirium.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly units while they are wholly within 7" of your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Gardener of Nurgle
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This daemon seeks to expand the borders of Nurgle’s Garden.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: If your general is contesting an objective not contested by any enemy models, roll a dice.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 3+, that objective is considered by you to be **desecrated**. Friendly units have **WARD (4+)** while they are contesting a desecrated objective. If your opponent gains control of a desecrated objective, it is no longer desecrated.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Pestilent Breath
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Spoilpox Scrivener has breath so foul that it can stun a full-grown rhinox.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 7" of your general and roll a dice for each model in that unit.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit.

battleTraits.name: Desperate Remedies
battleTraits.lore: When fighters are afflicted with the plagues of Nurgle, all efforts to recuperate must be focused entirely on stemming the spread of the disease.
battleTraits.effect: If an ability would heal 1 or more damage points or return 1 or more slain models to a **DISEASED** enemy unit, that ability does not heal any damage points or return any slain models to it. Instead, it no longer has the **DISEASED** keyword. **MANIFESTATIONS** and **faction terrain** features cannot be given the **DISEASED** keyword by any friendly abilities.

battleTraits.name: Wracked with Disease
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: The Maggotkin wage war with weeping wounds and pustulant boils as well as with rusted weapons.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3 for each **DISEASED** enemy unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Blessed by the Plaguefather
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: Each of the Maggotkin is a walking vector of disease, a willing incubator for maladies that ravage the body and spirit with horrific virulence.
battleTraits.effect:
You cannot pick **MANIFESTATIONS** or terrain features to be the targets of this ability. Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Infect:*** Pick an enemy unit that is in combat with a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit to be the target. The target has the **DISEASED** keyword.

***Spread:*** Pick a **DISEASED** enemy unit to be the target. Each other enemy unit within the target’s combat range has the **DISEASED** keyword.

***Mutate:*** If all enemy units on the battlefield have the **DISEASED** keyword, inflict 1 mortal damage on each of them.

battleTraits.name: Burst Pustules
battleTraits.lore: As blighted flesh is pierced and hewn, quivering boils erupt, showering all with Nurgle’s glistening gifts.
battleTraits.effect: Each time a **DISEASED** enemy unit would be destroyed, before the last model in the unit is removed from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, pick another enemy unit within 9" of that model to be **DISEASED**.

battleTraits.name: Nurgle's Embrace
battleTraits.lore: The Grandfather’s generosity proves overwhelming for many…
battleTraits.effect: Spend any number of your **disease points**. For each disease point you spend, pick an enemy unit that is in combat with any of your units and roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit (you can pick the same enemy unit more than once).

battleTraits.name: Daemonic Summoning
battleTraits.lore: The scions of Nurgle enter the battlefield through rifts torn in reality.
battleTraits.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Diseased
battleTraits.lore: Each of the Maggotkin is a walking vector of diseases that ravage both body and spirit.
battleTraits.effect: Each time an **attack** made by a friendly model scores a critical hit, you receive 1 **disease point**, to a maximum of 7.

heroicTraits.name: Grandfather's Blessing
heroicTraits.lore: This mighty Nurglite is so diseased that they are rejuvenated by decay and plague.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat with a **DISEASED** enemy unit, **Heal** (**D6)** this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Gift of Febrile Frenzy
heroicTraits.lore: This general can invigorate their usually sluggish minions by releasing a fever upon them that drives them into a wild delirium.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1" to the **Move** characteristic of friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units that do not have ****FLY**** if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the **move**.

heroicTraits.name: Overpowering Stench
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit in combat with this unit
heroicTraits.lore: This general exudes an odour so wretched that even Nurgle’s daemons cannot adequately describe it. Enemies recoil, choking on their own vomit at the slightest whiff and rendered speechless as their senses are overwhelmed.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

artefactsOfPower.name: Rustfang
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: Rustfang is a cursed battleaxe whose blade crawls with a thick layer of sentient corrosion. The slightest touch of this blade spreads its ferric blight, chewing away the foe’s armour in moments.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy ****HERO**** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the battle.

artefactsOfPower.name: The Witherstave
artefactsOfPower.lore: Carved from the heartwood of a tormented Treelord, the Witherstave thrums with a soured mockery of the Sylvaneth spirit song. Those that hear it feel a terrible weakness shiver their limbs as a jarring dirge of despair clouds their minds.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: The Carrion Dirge
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: When blown, this filth-encrusted horn shrieks with the tongue of a thousand carrion crows. Those outside Nurgle’s favour who hear it are struck with a deep despondency. Why stand defiant? Why seek victory? Why do anything at all?
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 3 from each target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

regimentOfRenown.name: Incubation Period
regimentOfRenown.lore: Nurgle’s gifts can incubate slowly within the afflicted, gaining a malign sentience.
regimentOfRenown.declare: This ability must be used to **deploy** this Regiment of Renown.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Set up the units in this Regiment of Renown in reserve **festering within**. They have now been deployed.

regimentOfRenown.name: Bursting With Life
regimentOfRenown.lore: Guts roil and buboes weep before cheering Nurglings burst forth from the slain.
regimentOfRenown.effect: If a friendly non-**NURGLE’S GIFT** unit would be destroyed, before the last model is removed from play, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll for each other friendly non-**NURGLE’S GIFT** unit that has been destroyed this battle. On a 5+, pick a friendly unit that is **festering within** and set it up wholly within 6" of that model. It can be set up in combat.

abilities.name: Fleshy Abundance
abilities.lore: The sorcerer generously bestows a growth spurt of the most repulsive kind upon their allies, causing their bodies to bloat with great wobbling mounds of grey-green fat.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:
• Heal (D3) the target.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Cloying Quagmire
abilities.lore: The sorcerer thrusts their hands into the soil, causing the ground beneath their enemies to putrefy into a sucking, grasping quagmire.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn. If the target’s Save characteristic is 3+ or better, subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Magnificent Buboes
abilities.lore: With a gracious sweep of their hand, the sorcerer bestows upon their victim one of Nurgle’s prettiest afflictions – a clutch of debilitating pustules and boils.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy **Hero** within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks and subtract 1 from casting rolls, chanting rolls, banishment rolls and unbinding rolls for the target.

abilities.name: Disease and Pestilence Personified
abilities.lore: The Tallyband is a trudging, lumbering, squirming mass of rancid daemonflesh that rolls across the battlefield like the inexorable approach of death itself.
abilities.effect: From the second battle round onwards, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, by the ‘Wracked with Disease’ ability.

abilities.name: Tenders of the Garden Grotesque
abilities.lore: The children of Grandfather Nurgle seek any opportunity to rot the veil and let the festering delights of his Garden spill into the realms.
abilities.effect: During army composition, you can include 2 **Feculent** **Gnarlmaws** in your army instead of 1.

abilities.name: From Noxious Skies
abilities.lore: The air fills with the thunderous drone of membranous wings as the warriors of the Affliction Cyst ride their bloated Rot Flies into battle.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** units that have **FLY**.
abilities.effect: Remove the targets from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Vectors of Contagion
abilities.lore: The bloated forms of these Nurglites are ever at bursting point, ready to shower attackers with contagious fluid.
abilities.effect: Each time a model in a friendly **ROTBRINGERS** unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a number of dice equal to the slain model’s Health characteristic, to a maximum of 4. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.
